description: Construction of a single storey outbuilding to the rear of property for use as a gym/games room (Retrospective)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): 3000/EXT/120-01/SP; 3000/EXT/120-01a/SP; 3000/EXT/120-02/SP.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the proposed plans/submitted information only.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with 	policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4 and D5 of the 	London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The existing detached rear outbuilding shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the development hereby approved, and shall not be used for habitable accommodation, as an independent dwelling or any industrial, commercial or business use.	No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 12.
